English.Text: If not skill, at least courage is rewarded. The volunteer rushes inside the engine room to close the leaking valve, screaming a Glory Be as the steam broils his skin. Both steam and storm recede once the valve is slammed closed, and the crew can take its time repairing the abused machinery. The volunteer spends the rest of the trip preaching the Lord's grace and his incessant sermon make the other sailors regret the tempest and its terrifying shrieks.
